description: Royal Gourmet provides hotels, restaurants, and supermarkets with over 100 varieties of premium quality fish, meat and poultry.

RPMinerals mines, processes, and supplies added-value specialty mineral and chemical products for various industrial applications like oil & gas well drilling fluids, metal casting, paper manufacturing, and environmental and civil engineering.
RSA Global is a digital freight forwarding and supply chain solutions company focusing on emerging markets in the Middle East, Africa and India.
Runa offers a complete cloud-based HR and payroll software solution designed and built for small to medium-sized companies in Latin America.
RZ is a one-stop-shop for food packaging products, with over 2000 products including disposable cups, cutlery, cling films, baking products, and hygiene products.

Saferoad provides telematics solutions in the Middle East, going beyond managing fleets and their maintenance costs to optimizing drivers’ utilization, ensuring drivers safety, and helping companies to reduce the OPEX and insurance expenses.
Sailogy aims to revolutionize the boat charter industry, making seafaring vacations commonplace.
Salasa provides reliable, cost-effective, and scalable e-commerce fulfillment in the Middle East, managing the complete logistics value chain from handling to shipping.
SalaUno is a Mexican healthcare company focused on scaling a cost-effective, private eye-care system to prevent avoidable blindness.
Saryx is a health and safety regulatory compliance platform.

SASCO Group manufactures & exports high quality stationery. The group also includes Smart Office Solutions (SOS), a one stop B2B e-commerce platform, providing procurement departments with better services and prices to purchase without petty cash and theft.
Satispay is the leading mobile payment platform in Italy. Users can send payments to other Satispay users, pay for in-store and online purchases, or make in-app purchases.
Savant Pharm is a pharmaceutical company that develops, manufactures and markets medicinal products for human use.
Scalefocus is a software development and digital services company with a mission to help customers grow their business by leveraging the latest technology and top talent.
Scanntech offers independent grocery stores a point-of-sale system and complete SaaS ERP store management software.
Scommerce is Vietnam’s leading e-commerce logistics ecosystem, bringing six distinct services from on-demand delivery to warehousing onto one platform.

Scriptr is a cloud service that simplifies the connection of IoT devices to the internet. It allows developers to create custom APIs with the simplicity of JavaScript and the scalability of the cloud, while removing server and application stack management tasks.
Securitize delivers and provides the infrastructure for trusted, end-to-end, global digital securities solutions for private market participants.
SEG Ingeniería is the leading energy efficiency and energy cost reduction consultancy firm in Uruguay.
Seha Healthcare is a hospital group that invests and partners with prominent doctors and owners of medium-sized private hospitals.
